actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution And Civil Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Civil Justice

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the United States government from increasing its debt except for a specific purpose by law adopted by three-fourths of the membership of each House of Congress.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits the federal government from increasing its debt except for a specific purpose by law adopted by three-fourths of the membership of each chamber.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States prohibiting the United States government from increasing its debt except for a specific purpose by law adopted by three-fourths of the membership of each House of Congress.
